{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl | since=c++20 |1=
constexpr decltype(auto) operator[]( difference_type n ) const
  requires ranges::random_access_range&lt;Base&gt;;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Returns the element at specified relative location, after transformation. 

Effectively returns {{c|std::invoke(*parent_-&gt;fun_, current_[n])}}, where {{c|*parent_-&gt;fun_}} is the transformation function stored in the parent {{tt|transform_view}}, and {{tt|current_}} is the underlying iterator into {{tt|V}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par | n | position relative to current location.}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
the transformed element
